Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 1 of 5 -- 1.5 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 1 of 5
(Health Unit Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Madison, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a one and five-tenths (1.5) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $159,800 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and supporting facilities and equipment of and for the Madison Parish Health Unit?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 2 of 5 -- 3.56 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 2 of 5
(Library Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Madison, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a three and fifty-six hundredths (3.56) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $379,200 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2023 and ending with the year 2032, for the purpose of maintaining and supporting the public library in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 3 of 5 -- 1.94 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 3 of 5
(Library Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Madison, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a one and ninety-four hundredths (1.94) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $206,600 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and supporting public library facilities in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 4 of 5 -- 2.71 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 4 of 5
(Courthouse and Jail Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Madison, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a two and seventy-one hundredths (2.71) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $288,600 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2023 and ending with the year 2032, for the purpose of maintaining, operating and purchasing equipment for the Parish courthouse and jail and the feeding and maintenance of Parish prisoners?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 5 of 5 -- 1 Mill Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 5 of 5
(Transportation Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Madison, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a one (1) mill tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $106,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2023 and ending with the year 2032, for the purpose of providing, operating, maintaining and supporting a public transportation service for the residents of the Parish, including the acquisition of vehicles and equipment to provide such service?
